articles.title: French Preparatory Committee Inaugurated
articles.content:
French Preparatory Committee Inaugurated 
    Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- A French preparatory committee for commemorating the 60th anniversaries of the liberation of Korea and the Workers' Party of Korea was formed by the France-Korea Friendship Association on July 25.
 Andre Aubry, delegate president of the association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The preparatory committee set the days from July 25 to October 15 as a celebration period and discussed the issue of holding  various functions in this period.

RS Calls for Glorying Exploits Performed by Kim Il Sung for Korea's Liberation
articles.content:
RS Calls for Glorying Exploits Performed by Kim Il Sung for Korea's Liberation 
    Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- All party members and other working people should more dynamically accelerate the on-going general march of Songun revolution with ardent patriotism and thus fully demonstrate the strong desire and firm will of the Korean people to eternally glorify the country as Kim Il Sung's Korea in the run-up to the 60th anniversary of the liberation of the country. Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in an editorial calling on them to display ardent patriotism and glorify the great exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung in achieving the liberation of the country. 
 They should devote themselves to making their socialist homeland to which Kim Il Sung dedicated his whole life, richer and more powerful. This is the true way for them to eternally glorify his immortal exploits performed for national liberation and the nation-building and do their bit as his soldiers and students. Whoever has inherited this great patriotic tradition of Kim Il Sung's nation and is fully equipped with the spirit of socialist patriotism should turn out in the crucible of the on-going worthwhile struggle to perform new miracles and feats in the indomitable revolutionary spirit and self-sacrificing spirit.    
The editorial calls on all the people united close around the headquarters of the revolution to fully display the strong patriotic enthusiasm and bring about a radical turn in building a great prosperous powerful nation this significant year and thus strikingly demonstrate to the world the victory and prosperity of Juche Korea which shines with the august name of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: DPRK Youth and Students Delegation Leaves for Venezuela
articles.content:
DPRK Youth and Students Delegation Leaves for Venezuela 
    Pyongyang, August 1 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the youth and students of the DPRK headed by Kim Kyong Ho, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, left here Monday to participate in the 16th World Festival of Youth and Students in Venezuela.
 The delegation was seen off at Pyongyang Railway Station by Jang Yong Chol, secretary of the C. C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, and others and Caridad Adela Galan Pelegrino, charge d' affaires ad interim of the Cuban embassy here.    
 It will participate in the functions of the festival from August 8 to 15 to strengthen friendship, unity and solidarity with progressive youth and students of the world including Venezuelan youngsters.
